response.content: It's a windows course. But you were easily able to get over those bumps right?

results.content_html: I use MAC, and so far, I had two bumps "git-bash" and "Ruby installation."

results.content: So far, the course has been great.  The combined visuals and style of presentation has been a great match to my learning style.  I am not new to Ruby, but wanted to do a refresher and some projects and I am understanding the "why" certain things are the way they are rather than just "that is the way it is" and memorizing.
results.content_html: So far, the course has been great. The combined visuals and style of presentation has been a great match to my learning style. I am not new to Ruby, but wanted to do a refresher and some projects and I am understanding the "why" certain things are the way they are rather than just "that is the way it is" and memorizing.
